author: Khac Phu Nguyen
title: $14 Billion Windfall? Saylor's Bitcoin Bet May Crush Wall Street Expectations
description: MicroStrategy's Q2 profit could rival Amazon--without selling a thing, thanks to Bitcoin's rally and a rule change
content: Michael Saylor's Strategy (MSTR, Financial) may be on track for a stunning Q2 paper profit of approximately $14 billion, driven by an unrealized, non-GAAP gain, which, if realized, would be categorizâ€¦ [+1845 chars]
